excerpt: The deal positions the merged company to benefit from an expected offshore drilling upcycle.
title: Transocean To Buy Valaris in $5.8B All-Stock Deal

excerpt: The awards build on Tenaris’ role in earlier phases of the ultradeepwater Black Sea project.
title: TPAO Awards Contracts to Tenaris for Sakarya Gas Project

excerpt: Suspended by force majeure since the spring of 2021, work on the Mozambique LNG project has restarted with over 4,000 workers now engaged onshore and offshore to meet a 2029 deadline for first LNG.
title: TotalEnergies CEO, Mozambique President Confirm Mozambique LNG Restart

excerpt: An earlier deal to double Israel’s gas exports to Egypt led to approval of Leviathan’s Phase 1B expansion by guaranteeing long-term cash flow to finance the project.
title: Chevron, NewMed, Ratio Declare FID on Leviathan Phase Expansion
